alert.note: Alert for Box Butte; Cheyenne; Morrill; Scotts Bluff; South Sioux (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 20 at 5:59PM CDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Box Butte, northeastern Scotts Bluff, northern Cheyenne, Morrill and southeastern Sioux Counties through 545 PM MDT... At 458 PM MDT, trained weather spotters reported strong wind gusts with the thunderstorms along a line extending from near Hemingford to Brownson. Movement was east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Alliance, Sidney, Bridgeport, Bayard, Hemingford, Lodgepole, Dalton, Gurley, Sunol, Brownson, Alliance Airport, Northport, Angora, Colton, Court House And Jail Rocks, Berea, Flahertys Corner, Lake Minatare, Wild Horse Butte and Lake Minatare Campground. This includes Interstate 80 in Nebraska between mile markers 45 and 53, and between mile markers 76 and 77. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Box Butte; Cheyenne; Morrill; Scotts Bluff; South Sioux
